org.elasticsearch.discovery.zen.fd

Class MasterFaultDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.discovery.zen.fd.FaultDetection
        • org.elasticsearch.discovery.zen.fd.MasterFaultDetection

  • public class MasterFaultDetection
extends FaultDetection
    A fault detection that pings the master periodically to see if its alive.
